items.name: Refurbished Apple iPod Touch 8GB MP3 Player Wi-Fi Digital Music/Video Touchscreen 2nd Gen
items.longDescription: This iPod Touch features Apple's revolutionary Multi-Touch display that allows you to glide through photos, albums, and playlists with a flick of a finger, or shrink and enlarge images with a mere pinch and spread. it has 802.11b/g wireless LAN, so you get a whole new level of entertainment options. Check your email, watch videos on YouTube, navigate your way through the city with Google Maps, and download an endless supply of music, games and apps through iTunes and the App Store. Speaking of games, thanks to the Accelerometer motion detection technology, you can tilt and turn your iPod for life-like controlling. Turn a steering wheel, shake and roll a die, tilt the pinball machine, or simply change the 3.5-inch screen from portrait to landscape view.FeaturesColor: Black2nd Generation 8 GB flash drive3.5-inch widescreen Multi-Touch display (480 x 320 resolution @ 163 pixels per inch) Wi-Fi 802.11b/g wireless LAN - check email, download media, Google Maps, and more!Accelerometer responds to movement - automatically switches from portrait to landscape view; perfect for racing/tap-and-tilt games!Built-in speaker Touchscreen QWERTY keyboard layoutSupport for 480p and 576p component TV outAudio frequency response: 20 Hz to 20,000 HzBuilt-in rechargeable lithium ion batteryMusic playback time: up to 36 hoursVideo playback time: up to 6 hoursUnit Dimensions:4.3 x 2.4 x 0.33-inches (H x W x D, approximate)Weight: 4.05 oz (approximate)I/O Ports:Dock connector3.5 mm stereo headphone jackPackage Includes:Apple iPod touch 8 GB Wi-Fi Media PlayerGeneric earphonesUSB 2.0 cableDock adapterQuick Start GuideRefurbished with 90 day warranty Grade B: Product is in very good condition but may have cosmetic blemishes, examples of which are (but not limited to):May have scratches in caseMay have scratches in the screenMay have hairline crack in caseMay have dead pixelsMay have engraving removed from back casing

items.name: Apple iPad 2 16GB Wi-Fi Refurbished with 1 Year Warranty
items.shortDescription: This refurbished Apple iPad 2 is in excellent working and cosmetic condition and is ready for your immediate enjoyment. Sync with your iTunes account and have extensive access to the Apple App Store at your fingertips. This device is ready for your gaming, movie watching, surfing, emailing, note taking, picture taking or Face Timing — anytime, anywhere.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Refurbished Apple iPad 2 with WiFi 9.7" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><ul><li>1.0GHz A5 Dual-Core processor</li><li>512MB DDR2 of system memory</li><li>9.7" touchscreen, 1024 x 768</li><li>Built-in 802.11a/b/g/n WiFi and Bluetooth v2.1 + EDR</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Back webcam and front webcam</li><li>30-pin dock connector port, 3.5mm headphone mini-jack</li><li>16GB onboard storage memory</li><li>Up to 10 hours of run time on a full charge</li><li>Weighs 1.33 lbs; 9.5" x 0.34" x 7.31" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Apple iOS 4</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

items.name: Apple Watch Magnetic Charging Cable
items.longDescription: Charging your Apple Watch is utterly effortless with an Apple solution that combines MagSafe technology with inductive charging. It’s a completely sealed system free of exposed contacts. And it’s very forgiving, requiring no precise alignment. You simply hold the connector near the back of the watch, where magnets cause it to snap into place automatically.

items.name: Apple iPad 4 16GB Wi-Fi Refurbished
items.shortDescription: The Apple iPad 4 is a tablet computer designed with enhanced features to include a Retina display and a change from the 30-pin connection to a Lightning cable with additions such as faster WiFi connectivity, a faster processor and higher camera quality. The iPad 4 is the perfect device for media downloads including books, music, photos, applications, games and more.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Refurbished Apple MD510LL/A iPad 4 with WiFi 9.7" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><ul><li>1.4GHz Apple A6X dual-core processor</li><li>1GB DDR2 of system memory</li><li>9.7" touchscreen, 2048 x 1536 resolution</li><li>Built-in 802.11a/b/g/n WiFi and Bluetooth v4.0</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Back 5MP webcam and front 1.2MP webcam with microphone</li><li>3.5mm headphone jack, Lightning docking connector</li><li>16GB onboard storage memory</li><li>3-axis gyro, accelerometer, ambient light sensor, digital compass</li><li>Built-in speaker</li><li>Up to 10 hours of battery life</li><li>Weighs 1.44 lbs; 9.5" x 0.34" x 7.31" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Apple iOS 8.4</li><li>Safari browser and iTunes (for applications)</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

items.name: i-Blason ArmorBox Kido Protection Case for original Apple iPad mini and Apple iPad mini Retina, Assorted Colors
items.shortDescription: The i-Blason ArmorBox Kido Protection Case is made of super lightweight EVA material that provides tons of cushion around your tablet. Thus, your kids will not be able to hurt your tablet, no matter how they throw it around. Also, the case can be converted easily into a stand for your kids to take a break and watch some videos while you can have five minutes of peace of mind.
items.longDescription: <strong>i-Blason ArmorBox Kido Protection Case for Apple iPad 1<sup>st</sup> and 2<sup>nd</sup> Generation:</strong><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Convertible to a stand case with handle</li><li>Lightweight and child-friendly</li><li>Hazard-free EVA material</li><li>Compatible with original iPad mini and second generation iPad mini with Retina display</li><li style="list-style: none"> </li></ul>

items.name: Apple TV MD199LL/A
items.longDescription: Model: MD199LL/A. <br>The new Apple TV with 1080p HD gives you all the best entertainment right on your widescreen TV. Choose from thousands of current and classic movies and TV shows on iTunes, many in amazing 1080p HD. Watch live sports in HD. Access content from Netflix, YouTube, Vimeo, and more.* And with AirPlay, you can play video, show off photos, and enjoy music from your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch on your TV.***Selected titles now available on Netflix. Subscription required for Netflix.**AirPlay is available on all devices running iOS 4.3 or later. Some features require the latest software. Requires second-generation Apple TV or later.<br><p><b>Features:</b><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Wireless media streaming</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Wired Connectivity:</b> Ethernet, Optical, HDMI, USB</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Wireless Technology:</b> Wi-Fi Ready</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Digital Tuner:</b> No</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>HD Compatibility:</b> HD Display When Connected to an Optional HD Source</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Video Resolution:</b> HD - 1080p</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Video Upconversion:</b> 1080p</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Disc Capacity:</b> 0</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>File Formats Supported:</b> GIF, H.264/AVC, MOV, MPEG 4, Motion JPEG, TIFF, AIFF, WAV, AAC, MP3, JPEG</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Output Type:</b> HDMI, Micro-USB, Optical Digital Audio, 10/100 Ethernet LAN</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Includes:</b> Power Cord, Remote Control</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Weight:</b> 1.0 Lb.</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li><b>Warranty Description:</b> 1 Year Limited Manufacturer</li></ul>
